page.title: 12St Annes - Local News
page.content: Fylde beach atom probe under way.A Â£39,000 county council survey of radiation levels all over Lancashire started following newspaper campaign over nuclear discharges into the Irish Sea.Local paper sponsored survey of Fylde beaches through local scientists revealed levels normal. Object of council survey to get information more quickly than at present from regulatory authorities. Resort given face_lift for season, trees planted,path resurfaced, landscaping.Many projects under Manpower Services Community Progamme. Open top double decker bus could prove major new tourist attraction.Â£1,500 will be spent on one of the 1965 buses from Lancaster City Council.
